meaning_str.bing:
n. 型；模范；典型；模特儿
v. 做模特儿；（向顾客）穿戴展示；将…做成模型；复制
adj. 模范的

做模特儿；（向顾客）穿戴展示；将…做成模型；复制

模型；典范；模范；榜样；范例；原型；示范；型号；设计；模特；代表作；仿制品
塑造（人物形象、性格等）；表现（行为、技能）以供学习；展示（时装）；（向顾客）穿戴展示；将…做成模型

1.en: This section shows you how to do this using a physical model and its objects. A similar approach can be used for logical models as well.
1.cn: 本节展示如何使用一个物理模型及其对象来实现这个目标——对于逻辑模型也可以使用类似的方法。

2.en: She has drawn up a four-point model that could be applied to the behaviour of any creature, including humans, to identify heroic acts.
2.cn: 她拟订了用来确定英雄行为的四点模式，可以应用于辨别任何动物（其中包括人类）的行为。

3.en: Every model makes simplifications , but some of the simplifications in Black-Scholes looked as if they would matter.
3.cn: 任何模型都不免有所简化，只是布·斯方程中的简化看上去似乎相当要紧。

0.en: It was the model for the calamity depicted in Interstellar.
0.cn: 这是《星际穿越》中描述的灾难模型。

1.en: I had three model rockets as a kid, and that was the largest space program in India.
1.cn: 我小时候有过三个火箭模型，那是印度最大的三个太空计划了。

2.en: Hobby I used to have. The Battle of the Wilderness. I spent months building a model of it.
2.cn: 我以前的爱好，莽原之役，我花了几个月，造了一个模型。

3.en: He and his research partner, Dr. Kim park, have come up with a model that predicts earthquakes.
3.cn: 他和他的研究伙伴基姆帕克博士设计出了一个可以预测地震的理论模型。

4.en: This is for a full scale rocket, not a model. Well, I've adjusted the formula. Not correctly.
4.cn: 那是给全尺寸火箭用的，而不是给模型用的。我已经调整过配方了。没调整对。

5.en: Is it a house for elves and fairies? Oh, no. This is a model. The real house will be much bigger.
5.cn: 是给精灵和小仙子住的吗？噢，不。这是模型。真的房子可要比这个大多了。

6.en: And instead of standing around watching, you can help us build your smaller guidance system. And with all these new skills, you'd be able to fix any model train. You'd be the king of the train store!
6.cn: 与其站着傻看，你不如帮我们创建更小的导向系统。有了新的技能，你可以修好任何火车模型你将成为火车模型店之王！

7.en: And so for the movie, I built a mathematical model Wormhole based on Einstein's relativity equations.
7.cn: 因此对于这部电影，基于爱因斯坦的相对论方程式，我构建了一个数学模型虫洞。

8.en: These things don't make any sense! We can't even model them. These are 100 times bigger than the MBS.
8.cn: 这些数据根本说不通，我们甚至无法建立模型它的数量，比房贷证券要大100倍。

9.en: Grampy Rabbit, how did you go to the moon? I flew in the rocket. It's a bit small. This is just a model.
9.cn: 兔爷爷，你是怎么到月球上的？我是坐在火箭上飞过去的。这个有点小。这个只是一个模型。

10.en: But my model is so much cleaner, I have formulas and algorithms and χ-square and standard deviation. What do you have?
10.cn: 但我的模型更为清晰，我推导出了公式，算法，还有卡方检验和标准差，你有什么?

11.en: It's very small. Is it a house for elves and fairies? Oh, no. This is a model. The real house will be much bigger.
11.cn: 这个房子可真小呀。是给精灵和小仙子住的吗？噢，不。这是模型。真的房子可要比这个大多了。

12.en: So, I think if we want to predict the height of the wave, we need to use elasticity theory and model the lattice as one continuous flexible piece.
12.cn: 我觉得如果想预测起伏的高度，我们需要用到弹性理论还要将格架作为一个连续柔性块的模型。

13.en: You don't know the half of it. It was billed as a lively give and take on the merits of model train sizes. But it was actually a setup to intimidate weak minded spineless rubes into buying H O starter sets.
13.cn: 你是不知道呀，本来宣传的是说今晚将会是个针对模型火车体积的优劣而进行的现场讨论会，可实际上只是为了唬那些没定力的乡巴佬去买HO轨距的入门级火车。

14.cn: 拍摄主题要调整？是模特。

15.en: It escaped capture aboard a stolen Corellian YT model freighter.
15.cn: 他乘坐一艘被盗的科瑞利安YT型号运输舰逃脱了追捕。

16.en: What's the second model? What are you talking about? All-in-one.
16.cn: 第二款产品是什么？你在说什么呢？一体机

17.en: I don't understand. Why is he in this? He's a model, mom. Oh, wait, wait. Your boyfriend's a model?
17.cn: 我不明白，他怎么在这里头？他是模特，老妈。等等，你男友是模特？

18.en: I'm going to model u.n., but we're dining tonight, right? Butter, 7:00.
18.cn: 我要去模特班了，但我们一起吃晚饭是吗？在吧特，7点。

19.en: All right, so, shh! Tyra Banks is about to kick someone off America's Next Top Model.
19.cn: 好吧，大家安静！泰拉·班克斯(超模之母)马上要从全美超模大赛里踢人了。
